course_title: Variable Topics Seminar: Models of Social Science
class_notes:
CONCURRENTLY TAUGHT W/QTM 490-2


This course will introduce students to a variety of modeling traditions in the social sciences, including economics, political science, psychology, and sociology. The traditions covered will include decision theory, game theory, network analysis, and social choice theory.
sections: Class Nbr: 4079, Section #: 4, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Patty, Status: Open
